org.echo.mobile.framework.core.crypto.internal

Class EdDSAKeyProviderImpl

  • org.echo.mobile.framework.core.crypto.internal.EdDSAKeyProviderImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EdDSAKeyProvider

    public class EdDSAKeyProviderImpl
implements EdDSAKeyProvider

    interface EdDSAKeyProvider implementation based on realisations of interface KeyPairCryptoAdapter

    Returns public key of generated key pair encoded in base58. Added specified prefix. Default prefix - EDDSA_KEY_PREFIX

    Wraps all errors in exception LocalException

    See Also:
    interface EdDSAKeyProvider, interface KeyPairCryptoAdapter, exception LocalException
